text: David Geddes Hartwell (July 10, 1941 January 20, 2016) was an American critic, publisher and editor of science fiction and fantasy. He was best known for work with Signet, Pocket and Tor Books publishers. He was also known as an award-winning editor of anthologies. He was born in Salem, Massachusetts. Hartwell died in Pleasantville, New York from complications of a fall on January 20, 2016 at the age of 74. ==References== ==Other websites== *Excerpt from the LOCUS Online Interview with David Hartwell, 2004. *Interview with David G.
